title: How to track my girlfriend's cell phone without her knowing it or installing anything on her phone - Quora

response.answer_text: I saw from your comments that you are concerned about someone doing this to you, but the answer is the same. I'm not going to tell you how to do it, and nobody here will, if they do, they are wrong (it won't work), omitting information or looking to get arrested. This action is illegal. Don't do it.You can't do it without installing something, you/they may not realize it was installed but something (malware) must be installed.Saying that they wouldn't know is a given, else it would just be a parental control app.This is often done by tricking the user into installing an app from an untrusted source, ie not on Google Play. If it's an iPhone, you can't unless the phone is jailbroken. If the user upgrades their iOS the jailbreak (and the hack) go away. For android, often upgrading the OS is helpful, but there is also security features that need to be turned off in order for these hacks to work. Android also has antivirus, which isn't the greatest but will work more often than not. I should note Android antivirus may have gotten better since I last looked at it, and it worked well enough even when I saw it. If anyone is caught hacking someone's cell phone in this way they are looking at 5 years+ prison time. If you think you are a victim of this, look around for a professional who will be able to discover it, often a small information security company. They will need your phone with full access to find out, so be prepared for that. If they find it, do not delete it - YET. Contact police first and see if they are willing to investigate. Unless the person using these types of hacks knows EXACTLY what they are doing they WILL get caught. The "virus" or trojan which spies on phones has to send the information somewhere, and police have ways of finding out who is the one picking the information up. Lastly, if your intention was to see if someone did this to you, don't ask how they did it, ask how to find outing they did. Hacking is not like what you see on TV. Real hacking is not exciting nor theatrical to watch.

I have a feeling you are not going to line my answer and for that reason I will keep it short. If you distrust your girlfriend so much that you feel the need to track her movements through her cell phone then you should end your relationship now. Don’t worry about tracking her cell, just break up and go your separate ways. You should seek counseling for your need to be controlling before you begin another relationship as well!

If you’re so concerned about your girlfriend’s fidelity that you feel the need to spy on her, you need to get out of the relationship. Either she is cheating, in which case that won’t ever change, or you are a controlling dick with low self esteem. In the first case, you will be better off. In the second case she will be, but in either case you should end it now.

I would like to give you the best advice ever, over your issue. The reason as to why people get engaged in a relationship, is to trust each other. If you feel that your girlfriend is not trustable and she gives you headache on how you can track her cellphone, Then you are risking. It is better for you to stop that relationship with immediate effect. The reasons why a person would want the ways to track his girlfriends cellphone, is because you have realised that she might be cheating on you. The best solution is to dismantle that relationship so that you can come out of frustration. I know you may not buy that idea of mine but it can help you, rather than straining to look for things that are not appropriate.

I think you have not given the appropriate reason why you have decided to track your girlfriends cellphone. There must be a reason why you have decided to do so. But just want to tell you that you should look for another one and forget about your girlfriend. Maybe she has failed to provide you with whatever you want. I would like to give you an appropriate piece of advice; It is better you sit with her and ask her whether she is reaady for friendship or not. She can not threaten your life until you are disturbed. Tracking her may not be the best solution. I wonder if she can give you her phone to hold for a day, receiving calls and responding to texts.

Get another girl If you feel that you have to survaill her then you’re done. Or you have major paranoid issues. see a shrink or maybe you could actually have a real conversation with her. Either way, your desire to track is indicative of a relationship with no future

You should try phonespector. You would have to be able to access her phone for only a minute or two at Max to install it. But I have it for my boy friend and it works great. They also have it for Iphone.
If you can't trust her… leave your relationship ASAP..

There is not much to write as the reflection lies solely in this musing. This quote spoke powerfully to me as it aligns with many of the feelings I’ve been having lately towards the manner in which our society defines success and purpose. I believe there is great danger in the way many prominent entrepreneurs, gurus, celebrities and motivational speakers deliver their advice. These days there are more “Top 10” articles and self-help books about success, beauty and even sex than there is water in the sea.
